newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: RUGBY UNION-PUMA ROBERTO GRAU JOINS TRANSVAAL.
newsitem.headline: RUGBY UNION-PUMA ROBERTO GRAU JOINS TRANSVAAL.

text.p: Argentinian test prop Roberto Grau signed a one-year contract with South African provincial side Transvaal in Johannesburg on Tuesday.
The 27-year-old player joins the Golden Lions from Cuyo and will make his competitive debut in the Super 12 series which begins in March.
Grau has 14 caps for the Pumas and played in both his country's losing test matches against South Africa at the end of last year.
